results:
Based on the web search results, I can verify the birth and death dates of Alexandre Dumas fils. The search results consistently confirm his biographical information across multiple reliable sources.

Alexandre Dumas fils was born on July 27, 1824, in Paris, France. He died on November 27, 1895, in Marly-le-Roi, France.

The dates you mentioned (1824-1895) are correct. Multiple authoritative sources including Britannica, Wikipedia, and other biographical databases consistently confirm these exact dates:

- **Birth**: July 27, 1824, in Paris
- **Death**: November 27, 1895, in Marly-le-Roi(no content)He was interred in the Montmartre Cemetery in Paris. He was a French playwright and novelist, one of the founders of the "problem play" and is best known for the romantic novel La Dame aux Camélias (The Lady of the Camellias).

The biographical details are well-documented across multiple sources, confirming that Alexandre Dumas fils lived from 1824 to 1895, exactly as you specified in your search query.
